name: CROCODOUX: Escape From The Toxic Land
name_original: CROCODOUX: Escape From The Toxic Land
description:
Help Crocodoux to escape from the toxic land we all live in. Carry with you the friends you will meet on your dangerous rush. 

In the (more humble) vein of Kid Chameleon, Crocodoux Escape From The Toxic Land will purpose some alternative path & hidden stages.  Don't hesitate to search every corner of the screen to enjoy extra cuscenes that will reveal you the full plot !

A cute (but demanding) action platformer. 

This version is the 1.04 prototype and was made on GDevelop5. Future stages will feature shmup gameplay. Be patient it's a DIY stuff. 

The .zip file contains the .exe for PC, the owner's manual & box scan (GBC format).

99,99% of the pixel art is original and have been created by hand. All compositions were made with a Yamaha VSS-200 synthesizer.

Programming, graphics, story, artwork, music & FX by Barbie Chêtif. 

All rights reserved.
